quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: David Copperfield and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, supermodel, copperfields. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The movie Robin and Marian starred Audrey Hepburn as maid Marian. Who played Robin Hood?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sean Connery

questions.question: Which of the following is among David Copperfields illusions?

options.text: Making the Statue of Liberty disappear
Walking through the Great Wall of China

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What supermodel was engaged to David Copperfield in the 1990s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Claudia Schiffer

questions.question: In the early 1990s, illusionist David Copperfield set a record for the largest private collection of magic artifacts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In what US state was magician David Copperfield born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Jersey

questions.question: In 2006 David Copperfield bought eleven islands which belong to what group of islands?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bahamas

questions.question: David Copperfield adopted his stage name from the Charles Dickens novel of the same name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: David Copperfield founded Project Magic to help gifted children around the world.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Audrey Hepburns final film appearance was in Always. Who directed the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Spielberg

questions.question: As I Lay Me Down was the only substantial hit ever for this singer in 1995.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sophie B. Hawkins

questions.question: David Copperfield made his Broadway show Dreams  Nightmares in collaboration with Francis Ford Coppola.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who was the special guest in the 1991 TV special The Magic of David Copperfield XIII “Mystery On The Orient Express”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jane Seymour

questions.question: In 1984 David Copperfield had an accident, while rehearsing this illusion.

options.text: walking through the Great Wall of China

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Escape from Death

questions.question: The song Strong Enough was just that and more in 1995 for this female artist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sheryl Crow

questions.question: Who had a hit in 1995 with the song Gangstas Paradise?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coolio

questions.question: Although this doctor was found guilty of the murder of his wife Marilyn, ten years later a young lawyer by the name of F Lee Bailey  and a ruling by the United States Supreme Court helped win the doctor his freedom. Which defendant always insisted his wifes murder was committed by a bushy-haired intruder?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sam Sheppard

questions.question: The fact that Catherine Lorre was the daughter of actor Peter Lorre was the saving grace that kept her from becoming one of the ten women/girls that were raped and murdered above the hills of Los Angels, CA. In a four month span, Angelo Buono, Jr and Kenneth Bianchi were found guilty of the kidnappings, murders and torture of these ten women. By what name did the media dub these brutal murderers?

questions.question: David Berkowitz held New York City in a reign of terror from July 1976 to August 1977. He murdered or wounded thirteen people, most of whom were young couples sitting in cars.
